org.drools.agent
Interface AgentEventListener

public interface AgentEventListener

This interface is used to provide callback style logging for the agents async events.

 

Method Summary
 void debug(java.lang.String message)
          These should not be logged, just shown if needed.
 void exception(java.lang.Exception e)
          An exception occurred.
 void info(java.lang.String message)
          For general info messages.
 void setAgentName(java.lang.String name)
          This sets the name for logging.
 void warning(java.lang.String message)
          For a warning (useful when tracking down problems).
